<style>
/* Modern Song Cards */
.songs-hero {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a0633 0%, #2a0845 100%);
  padding: 4rem 1rem;
}

.songs-grid {
  display: grid;
  gap: 2rem;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
  padding: 2rem;
}

.song-card {
  perspective: 1000px;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.card-inner {
  background: var(--twitch-dark-light);
  border-radius: 16px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transform-style: preserve-3d;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
}

.song-card:hover .card-inner {
  transform: rotateX(2deg) translateY(-8px);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(145,70,255,0.15);
}

.card-image {
  height: 280px;
  width: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-bottom: 3px solid var(--twitch-purple);
  position: relative;
}

.card-image::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(0,0,0,0) 60%, rgba(0,0,0,0.8) 100%);
}

.song-meta {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.release-year {
  background: var(--twitch-purple-dark);
  color: white;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}

.lyrics-preview {
  position: relative;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
  border-radius: 8px;
  margin: 1rem 0;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.reveal-lyrics {
  background: none;
  border: none;
  color: var(--glow-color);
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 0;
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Evolution Timeline */
.evolution-timeline {
  padding: 3rem 2rem;
  position: relative;
}

.timeline-item {
  display: flex;
  gap: 2rem;
  padding: 2rem 0;
  position: relative;
}

.timeline-item::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  left: 115px;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 2px;
  background: var(--twitch-purple);
}

.timeline-year {
  width: 100px;
  font-size: 1.5rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--glow-color);
}

.timeline-content {
  flex: 1;
  background: var(--twitch-dark-light);
  padding: 1.5rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  position: relative;
}

.timeline-content::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  left: -10px;
  top: 20px;
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background: var(--twitch-purple);
  transform: rotate(45deg);
}
</style>

<script>
// Add similar filtering logic as events page
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const filterButtons = document.querySelectorAll('[data-genre]');
  const songCards = document.querySelectorAll('.song-card');
  
  // Lyrics reveal functionality
  document.querySelectorAll('.reveal-lyrics').forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const lyricsDiv = e.target.closest('.lyrics-preview');
      lyricsDiv.style.maxHeight = '500px';
      e.target.remove();
    });
  });

  // Filtering logic
  document.querySelector('.genre-filter').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
    const target = e.target.closest('.filter-btn');
    if (!target) return;

    const genre = target.dataset.genre;
    filterButtons.forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
    target.classList.add('active');

    songCards.forEach(card => {
      card.style.display = genre === 'all' || card.dataset.genre === genre 
        ? 'block' 
        : 'none';
    });
  });
});
</script>
